argumentText:
ARGUMENT

| Step | Hyp | Ref | Expression |
|---|---|---|---|

| 1 |  | lcfrlem4.h | |- H = ( LHyp ` K ) |
| 2 |  | lcfrlem4.o | |- ._|_ = ( ( ocH ` K ) ` W ) |
| 3 |  | lcfrlem4.u | |- U = ( ( DVecH ` K ) ` W ) |
| 4 |  | lcfrlem4.v | |- V = ( Base ` U ) |
| 5 |  | lcfrlem4.l | |- L = ( LKer ` U ) |
| 6 |  | lcfrlem4.d | |- D = ( LDual ` U ) |
| 7 |  | lcfrlem4.q | |- Q = ( LSubSp ` D ) |
| 8 |  | lcfrlem4.e | |- E = U_ g e. G ( ._|_ ` ( L ` g ) ) |
| 9 |  | lcfrlem4.k | |- ( ph -> ( K e. HL /\ W e. H ) ) |
| 10 |  | lcfrlem4.g | |- ( ph -> G e. Q ) |
| 11 |  | lcfrlem4.x | |- ( ph -> X e. E ) |
| 12 | 9 | #P_adantr | |- ( ( ph /\ g e. G ) -> ( K e. HL /\ W e. H ) ) |
| 13 |  | #P_eqid | |- ( LFnl ` U ) = ( LFnl ` U ) |

| 15 | 14 | #P_adantr | |- ( ( ph /\ g e. G ) -> U e. LMod ) |
| 16 |  | #P_eqid | |- ( Base ` D ) = ( Base ` D ) |
| 17 | 16, 7 | #P_lssel | |- ( ( G e. Q /\ g e. G ) -> g e. ( Base ` D ) ) |
| 18 | 10, 17 | #P_sylan | |- ( ( ph /\ g e. G ) -> g e. ( Base ` D ) ) |
| 19 | 13, 6, 16, 14 | #P_ldualvbase | |- ( ph -> ( Base ` D ) = ( LFnl ` U ) ) |
| 20 | 19 | #P_adantr | |- ( ( ph /\ g e. G ) -> ( Base ` D ) = ( LFnl ` U ) ) |
| 21 | 18, 20 | #P_eleqtrd | |- ( ( ph /\ g e. G ) -> g e. ( LFnl ` U ) ) |
| 22 | 4, 13, 5, 15, 21 | #P_lkrssv | |- ( ( ph /\ g e. G ) -> ( L ` g ) C_ V ) |
| 23 | 1, 3, 4, 2 | #P_dochssv | |- ( ( ( K e. HL /\ W e. H ) /\ ( L ` g ) C_ V ) -> ( ._|_ ` ( L ` g ) ) C_ V ) |

| 25 | 24 | #P_ralrimiva | |- ( ph -> A. g e. G ( ._|_ ` ( L ` g ) ) C_ V ) |
| 26 |  | #P_iunss | |- ( U_ g e. G ( ._|_ ` ( L ` g ) ) C_ V <-> A. g e. G ( ._|_ ` ( L ` g ) ) C_ V ) |

| 29 | 27, 28 | #P_sseldd | |- ( ph -> X e. V ) |
